name: Lugi's Dream World (Remake)
description:
WASD to move

Left Shift to dash

Space bar to interact with chests and find health.

Ammo is limited, find water to reload your paintbrush.

Destroy all monsters to win.

Lugi's Dream World was originally created by William Easterday and myself as a 2D Top-Down Shooter about a little boy named Lugi who uses a magical paintbrush to fight off the monsters in his nightmares.

This is a remake of the original game, created by me, to explore my personal understanding of tiled-based art and coding in Unity.
